formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: The property that results will be returned into.

formElement.label: Location Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the location in which to remove resource group9s) from a resource description.

formElement.label: Location Type:
formElement.documentation: The type of the location in which to remove resource group(s) from a resource description.

formElement.label: Resource Type:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) resource object criteria for a resource definition embedded in a BAImage: resource type

formElement.label: Resource Group Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the resource group to remove.

formElement.label: Serialized Resource Group Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Additional resource groups to remove: an XML serialized list of sets of resource group object criteria, one per additional resource group, created using the procedure SerializeOtherObjectCriteria (optional, the resource group specified above is appended to this).

formElement.label: Resource Description Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the resource description to remove the resource group(s) from.

formElement.label: Container Type:
formElement.documentation: Container type to remove the resource group(s) from: must be 'Resource Description' for this procedure (to remove from another container type, use the appropriate other Remove... procedure instead).
